articles.title: American Airlines offers pilots nearly 17% raises in new contract proposal - CNBC
articles.description: American Airlines CEO Robert Isom on Thursday said the carrier has offered its pilots pay raises totaling nearly 17% under a new contract.
articles.content:
American Airlines CEO Robert Isom on Thursday said the carrier has offered its pilots pay raises totaling nearly 17% under a new contract, according to an internal video seen by CNBC.

articles.title: John Barilaro withdraws from $500,000 New York trade job - ABC News
articles.description: Former NSW deputy premier John Barilaro withdraws from his role as the state's Trade Commissioner to the Americas, describing his position as "untenable".
articles.content:
Former NSW deputy premier John Barilaro has decided to withdraw from his role as the state's Trade Commissioner to the Americas.
